description: The file defines interfaces related to warning reporting control within the WPEFramework. It includes virtual interfaces for warning events and reporting units, along with control mechanisms for configuring warning categories.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface for warning event objects, providing category information, serialization/deserialization, string representation, and warning status.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Interface for warning reporting units, including methods to report warnings, fetch category info, and manage category list.

classes.name: IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Interface for control objects that manage warning category exclusion and configuration, inheriting from Core::Messaging::IControl.

methods.name: Exclude
methods.description: Exclude specified category from warning reporting.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configure warning category with provided settings.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Create a clone (copy) of the warning reporting control object.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Report a warning event with an identifier and event information.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieve information about a specific warning category.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Add a category control to the category list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Remove a category control from the category list.
